development_requirements.description: The system must define for each user (when possible) whether the user is male or female and which category they belong to, in order to display personalized homepage content. If new user arrives via marketing campaign with URL parameter (e.g., utm_category=ED), system defines user as ED user. If returning user (completed at least one purchase), system identifies category of most recent purchase and defines user according to that category and gender. Smart Logic used to personalize homepage sections (hero, category drilldown, and CTAs) based on gender and category intent.
